data.name: Sink Or Swim Pools, LLC
data.address: 2300 Michigan Ct Suite A, Arlington, TX 76016

reviews.text: Happy Thanksgiving from Sink or Swim Pools 🦃💦 This Thanksgiving, we’re grateful for our amazing customers across Arlington, TX, and Tarrant County. Thank you for trusting us to keep your pools sparkling and ready for fun all year long. We wish you a joyful holiday filled with family, friends, and plenty of relaxation. 🍁 From all of us at Sink or Swim Pools—Happy Thanksgiving! 👉 Visit us online anytime
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"I think the price is good for service of pool and spa." "Amazing work highly knowledgeable excellent communication fair price." "The customer service I receive anytime I call the company is superb."

Great company been using them for years. When I needed to have the surface replaced. Their quote was the most reasonable. More Response from the owner 4 weeks ago Carl, thank you for your continued trust and for choosing our competitively priced resurfacing services.

Our pool is cleaner than it’s ever been! The communication we receive after every cleaning service is detailed and our tech is kind and thorough. The customer service I receive anytime I call the company is superb. Sink or Swim is far better than my previous pool company and costs less per month! More Response from the owner 2 months ago We are happy to have you as one of our loyal customers! We strive for great customer service in all aspects of what we do, including being competitive on pricin

Great company to work with. The office and field staff communicated daily to check-in, identify what steps were to be completed, and provided updates to the timeline when we experienced delays due to weather. The crews worked quickly but … More Response from the owner a year ago Very glad we were able to accommodate you and we thank you for your business!
